dsOverview.title: Sacramento Peak 9.1cm Solar Analyses, 1964-1973Jul

summary.p: This dataset contains once-daily synoptic solar maps of brightness temperature on a 25x21 grid for January 1964 to July 1973. The data were collected by the National Solar Observatory at Sacramento Peak and provided to DSS by Stanford University.

creator.name: UCAR/NCAR/CISL/DSS > Data Support Section,Scientific Computing Division, National Center for Atmospheric Research, University Corporation for Atmospheric Research

contributor.name: NSO/SP > National Solar Observatories, Sacramento Peak

dsOverview.variable: EARTH SCIENCE > Sun-earth Interactions > Solar Activity > Synoptic Maps
